publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-81 Michael Russell: Appointment of BBC Governor for Scotland—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to consult the Parliament regarding the nomination of the new BBC National Governor for Scotland prior to a decision being made on the replacement for the Reverend Norman Drummond who retires from the post on 31 July 1999. (lodged on 25 June) Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Keith Raffan, Mr Jamie Stone, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Andrew Wilson

*S1M-81 Michael Russell: Appointment of BBC Governor for Scotland—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to consult the Parliament regarding the nomination of the new BBC National Governor for Scotland prior to a decision being made on the replacement for the Reverend Norman Drummond who retires from the post on 31 July 1999. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Keith Raffan, Mr Jamie Stone, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Andrew Wilson
